name: woodpecker-ci
description: Woodpecker CI is a self-hosted continuous integration system based on pipelines defined in YAML. It integrates with Git repositories, runs builds in containers, and reports results through a lightweight web UI and webhooks.

features.title: Pipeline As Code
features.description: Define build pipelines in YAML files stored alongside your source code

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Execute each pipeline step in isolated Docker containers for consistency

features.title: Secret Management
features.description: Store sensitive credentials securely and inject them into builds as needed

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Extend functionality with community plugins for deployments, notifications, and testing

features.title: Webhook Support
features.description: Start builds automatically on push, pull request, or tag events from your repository
